messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] alice was winger
messages.msgSnippet: Yeah...Alice Cooper is great in concert - very theatrical-type performance. I didn t know that kip winger played in his group until I saw it mentioned today in
messages.messageBody:
Yeah...Alice Cooper is great in concert - very theatrical-type performance.
I didn't know that kip winger played in his group until I saw it mentioned
today in that website I posted.
Funny thing is how Alice Cooper is such a regular guy when he's not
performing. He lives here in the Phoenix area (in Paradise Valley, I
think)...is a dad and has a long time marriage with his wife, likes to play
golf - of all things. He looks and acts like a normal guy. My dh is a huge
fan of Alice...

Karin




----- Original Message -----
From: <llindsey3@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Wednesday, August 07, 2002 1:24 PM
Subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] winger


> WHOAAAA... so he (kip w) played with Alice Cooper first.. now THERE's an
act i was a big fan of.. for some reason.. i think i just liked him cause he
was so .. ... different.. lol
>
> L
